projects.name: QC Prof Stat
projects.description: A website that displays the grading distribution of professors at Queens College built with NodeJS and Google Cloud Firestore available at https://qc-prof-stat.web.app

projects.name: Social Media Clone
projects.description: An attempt to replicate the functions of a social media web application using NodeJS web server and mongo DB database

projects.name: Don't Stray Behind
projects.description: Collaborated with a team as participants in Lehman Hackathon Fall 2019 and created a service, built with Flask (Python) as a backend and HTML, CSS, JavaScript as a frontend, called Don’t Stray Behind to help people bring strays to animal shelters

projects.name: Tip Calculator
projects.description: Developed an Android Application Written in Java that calculates tip amount based on a user’s input

projects.name: Age Calculator
projects.description: Developed a program in C++ with QT and an Android (Java) Port that calculates a user’s age using their date of birth and the current system date
